content.description: Stand start on two incut crimps above head height. Throw up to a good hold with your right rearrange your feet and grab the good hold with your left. This is where it gets a little spicy. Pull up and lock off with your left and reach up high for a good crimp above the lip. Find the feet and rock up to two more crimps. Climb the slab to the top.
content.location: In the middle of the roof.

content.description: Sit start matched on a big jug with a heel hook and throw right to a good sidepull. Move your feet around and toss to a decent left crimp. Bring your heel in closer to you and reach up for a small right crimp. Relax yourself a little and bump your left to a higher crimp. Find some good feet and prepare to shoot up to an ok hold with your right. Once you are here work your way left into the top out of Mad Max Direct.
content.location: On the arete of The Roof boulder just to the right of Mad Max Direct.

content.description: Sit start as for Mad Max. Work your way up and right to top out to the right of the roof, on good holds.
content.location: On the arete of The Roof boulder

content.description:
There currently are three routes on this boulder. 

  This boulder starts with a fun powerful overhang and transitions to a delicate slab.  With nice quality rock and good holds, there are still a couple more lines to be climbed. It might need a little more cleaning in spots.
